terms.cancellation: Notice provided up to 14 days prior to the arrival date may incur a cancellation fee of €250 (Ireland), £250 (UK), or CAD$350 (Canada).
terms.Accommodation: Arranged with local host families, subject to availability.
terms.Holidays: The school observes main public holidays including those provided below, there is no refund for public holidays scheduled automatically.
terms.Insurance: Mandatory for ILEP students (€130 per annum, including PEL). Medical insurance required.
terms.Tuition Hours: 45 minutes per lesson. Standard Course is 15 lessons per week.
terms.Text Books: €28 for text book; €45 for IELTS course book.
terms.Policy of Care: Specific rules for 16 and 17 year old students; range of protected school holidays, with dates defined annually.
terms.other: Students should secure their medical insurance before travel.
terms.notation: For all courses: registration and fees required.
terms.accommodation_policy: Carefully selected host family regulations apply.
terms.Cancellation: Refer to Terms and Conditions displayed in the image.
terms.Medical insurance: Insurance coverage recommended prior to starting the course.
terms.Exams and Text book: IELTS exams cost £220. Digital Textbook fee is £32
terms.school_holidays: January 01; April 18, 21; May 05, 26; August 25; December 22, 2025 - January 02, 2026 (inclusive of public holidays).
terms.cancellation_policy: Notice provided up to 14 days prior to the arrival date may incur a cancellation fee of €250 (Ireland), £250 (UK), or CAD$350 (Canada).
terms.terms_summary: All cancellations must be notified in writing. Full payment of fees is due 4 weeks prior to the starting date. Additional conditions apply for registration and refunds.
